property.name: maxTime
property.label: Maximum Time
property.description: This is the maximum time before the flow auto advances the format should be 'H:M:S:MS'

property.name: showTimer
property.label: Show Timer
property.description: When marked as true this displays the timer on the screen

property.name: showReset
property.label: Show Timer Reset
property.description: When marked as true this displays a timer reset on the screen

property.name: timerLabel
property.label: Message to Users
property.description: Display a message to users about the timer
